data.name: Go Home, Mr. Fisk! Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the OST for Go Home, Mr. Fisk! containing ten loops of music from the game, as well as two versions of the song heard in the trailer. The full version of the trailer song is only available on this soundtrack.

Upon purchase, all of the music contained here is yours to use however you like, royalty-free. We only ask that you credit us if you decide to use the music publicly.

This package contains both mp3. and wav files of all the tracks.
